PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-05312022-05-19PS,  CBSA,  ,  ,  , 
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the IMMIGRATION AND REFUGEE PROTECTION REGULATIONS in order to repeal the provisions that prevented foreign nationals from Designated Countries of Origin from benefiting from an automatic stay of removal pending judicial review of a negative decision issued by the Refugee Appeal Division on their asylum claim.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0113 Publication Date: 2022-06-08
AttachmentsAttachment
